channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
1. lol this probaly sounds really stupid but how do i make my self an admin with test scape source. On most server you can just go to the char folder and edit player right to 3 same with stats but it dosnt work with testscape.
2. i put this in shops.cfg [code]shop = 42 everything_cool_2 2 2 157 5000 146 5000 163 5000 1401 500 2412 500 2413 500 2414 500 2643 500 3040 5000 3204 500[/code]
this in autospawn [code]spawn = 285 3234 3434 0 0 0 0 0 1 Veronica[/code]
and this in client.java [code]} else if (NPCID == 285) { //Veronica PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; // Every shop[/code]
i dont get any errors and it spwned the npc but theres no trade option

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @chick chick
item.description:
@chick wrote:

hyper1 plz help me

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @hyper1 hyper1
item.description:
@hyper1 wrote:

the first 3 or 4 numbers are the npc id change that 2 a npc that has a trade option and test scape making admins theres a tut in tutorials but here ill jsut tell u it
open ur client and hit ctrl + f
then type in 3 = admin
then scroll down about 5 lines and it should say
if (playername.equalsignoecase(“SOMEONES NAME WILL BE HERE”))
where the name is change it to your charater name.
hope that helps

Read full topic

item.description:
@Revolution1 wrote:

well you need to get the code for the trade option…

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @killer-byte killer-byte
item.description:
@killer-byte wrote:

  1. lol this probaly sounds really stupid but how do i make my self an admin with test scape source. On most server you can just go to the char folder and edit player right to 3 same with stats but it dosnt work with testscape.

  2. i put this in shops.cfg

    shop = 42	everything_cool_2				2	2	157	5000	146	5000	163	5000	1401	500	2412	500	2413	500	2414	500	2643	500	3040	5000	3204	500

this in autospawn

spawn = 285	3234	3434	0	0	0	0	0	1	Veronica

and this in client.java

} else if (NPCID == 285) { //Veronica PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; // Every shop

i dont get any errors and it spwned the npc but theres no trade option
